title: A Day at Work
description: Listen to a conversation about daily work routines.

audio.text:
A: Hi Tom! How's your day going?
B: Pretty busy, actually. I had three meetings this morning.
A: That sounds tiring. What time did you start work?
B: I usually start at 9, but today I came in early at 8 to prepare for a presentation.
A: Do you often have to prepare presentations?
B: Not really. Maybe once or twice a month. But I always have a lot of emails to answer.
A: Same here! I spend at least an hour on emails every morning.
B: By the way, are you free for lunch? I usually eat at my desk, but I want to take a proper break today.
A: Sure! Let's go to that new cafe downstairs. I finish my current task at 12:30.
B: Perfect. See you then!
